oracle.title: The Oracle Cup
oracle.description: Gaze into the coffee grounds. Let the dregs reveal your fortune.
oracle.instructions: Ask a yes no question and click the coffee cup to see what the is returned from the void!
answers: Does bigfoot go in the woods?
oracle.idle-new: Tap the cup to reveal your fate...

conspiracy.title: The Conspiracy Board
conspiracy.description: Connect the clues. Group the cryptids. Uncover the truth.
conspiracy.instructions: Click 4 items that belong in the same category and click submit.

evolution.title: Cryptid Evolution
evolution.description: Capture photographic evidence of the paranormal before it vanishes.
evolution.instructions: Use the arrow keys to join 2 of the same cryptid. They evelove into new beasts as you go!
evolution.control-hint: Use Arrow Keys or Swipe to Merge

trivia.title: Lore Master Trivia
trivia.description: Test your knowledge of the Uncanny Coffee Hour deep lore.
trivia.instructions: Trivia test of the Uncanny Coffee Hour and our friends!

match.title: Cryptid Match
match.description: Escape the Pacific Northwest forest before your coffee spills.
match.instructions: Match 2 cryptid cards that look the same. Rinse, repeat until the board is full.

saucer.title: Midnight Harvest
saucer.description: Pilot the saucer. Abduct the livestock.
saucer.instructions: Abduct cows to power your saucer. The more cows you abduct, the more farmers are called in to battle you! Drop cows on farmers to reduce their numbers.

page.title: The Arcade
page.subtitle: Pass the time while your coffee brews.
